Summarize key modifications — new features, bug fixes, refactors, or documentation updates.

## Checklist
- [ ] Read and followed the [Contributing Guidelines](https://github.com/xing-yiren/course_organization_template/wiki/%F0%9F%A7%AD-Contributing-Guidelines:-Issues-&-Pull-Requests)
- [ ] Self-tested locally to ensure CI will pass
- [ ] Updated documentation if needed ([guide](xxx))
- [ ] Verified accuracy or performance benchmarks if applicable
